data.author: Daniel Bell
data.body: Technology, like art, is a soaring exercise of the human imagination.

data.author: Sukant Ratnakar
data.body: Innovation is the outcome of a habit, not a random act.

data.author: Arthur C. Clarke
data.body: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.

data.author: Sean Gerety
data.body: The technology you use impresses no one. The experience you create with it is everything.

data.author: Matt Mullenweg
data.body: Technology is best when it brings people together.

data.author: Steve Jobs
data.body: Technology is nothing. What’s important is that you have a faith in people, that they’re basically good and smart, and if you give them tools, they’ll do wonderful things with them.
